title: Quick Tabs Manager Bug Fixes v7
details:
Fixed three bugs in sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js:

Bug #1 - quickTabHostInfo memory leak:
- Added periodic maintenance task _performHostInfoMaintenance() every 5 minutes
- Added max size guard (500 entries) with _pruneOldestHostInfoEntries()
- Maintenance validates entries against quickTabsState

Bug #2 - Adoption container validation:
- Added _validateAdoptionContainers() to check if tabs are in same Firefox container
- Uses browser.tabs.get() to retrieve cookieStoreId
- Logs WARNING on cross-container adoption but allows it

Bug #3 - Adaptive port timeout:
- Changed from fixed 500ms to adaptive timeout (700ms-3000ms)
- Uses 95th percentile of observed latencies via _recordLatencySample()
- Added message deduplication with _isDuplicateMessage() (2s TTL)
